channel.title: Client.java problem
channel.description: Helow, I downloaded a client + source but in the client, the Client.Java is GONE :( and i cant change the port. How do i get it back? i meen ALL the .java's don't show. Also how do i make it so you can't use a 2h with shield, and where do i put the code

item.title: Client.java problem
item.dc:creator: @r_r_r r r r
item.description:
@r_r_r wrote:

What you downloaded is a closed source client, which means you cant edit the files, you could de-compile it but you will get a lot of errors. Wielding a 2h without a shield is server side so wrong section.

Read full topic
